objective: how to re-create chat gpt deep research tool

sub_tasks.task: Define the scope, key features, use cases, and success criteria of the deep research tool
Analyze existing ChatGPT research workflows and pipelines to extract architectural patterns and best practices
Identify and select appropriate large language models, fine-tuning methods, and domain adaptation strategies
Design the multi-step orchestration pipeline including planner, researcher, synthesizer, and critic components
Develop a retrieval-augmented generation system: document ingestion, vector store, search algorithms, and RAG integration
Implement context management and memory mechanisms to support long-form, iterative research dialogs
Create citation and source-tracking modules to ensure verifiability and transparency
Design and build a user interface/UX that supports deep research workflows and iterative refinements
Establish evaluation metrics and testing protocols to measure accuracy, depth, and efficiency
Plan deployment, scaling, data privacy, security, and cost management strategies
